data = series.values
# data split
n_test = 12
# define config
config = [3, 12, 64, 3, 100, 200, 100]
# grid search
scores = repeat_evaluate(data, config, n_test)
# summarize scores
summarize_scores(' cnn-lstm' , scores)
Listing 14.50: Example of a CNN-LSTM model for forecasting monthly car sales.
Running the example prints the RMSE for each repeated evaluation of the model. The Ô¨Ånal
averaged RMSE is reported at the end of about 1,626, which is lower than the naive model,
